snippet: Precious Perry, 23, survived a difficult upbringing to become a kind of surrogate mother to her two siblings. She expects to graduate with a bachelor’s degree in May.
abstract: Children's Aid Society helps Precious Perry of Brooklyn with living expenses after she became kind of surrogate mother to her two siblings while still working on her bachelor's degree.
lead_paragraph: Precious Perry, 23, survived a difficult upbringing to become a kind of surrogate mother to her two siblings. She expects to graduate with a bachelor’s degree in May.

headline.print_headline: After Foster Care Years, a Woman Becomes a Role Model for Her Sisters
